author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Euronext Announces Volumes For February 2018
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - EURONEXT NV:
* EURONEXT ANNOUNCES VOLUMES FOR FEBRUARY 2018 * IN FEBRUARY 2018, AVERAGE DAILY TRANSACTION VALUE ON EURONEXT CASH ORDER BOOK STOOD AT EUR 9,141 MILLION, UP +29.4% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017
* IN FEBRUARY 2018, OVERALL AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON DERIVATIVES REACHED 638,880 CONTRACTS, UP +11.4% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017
* IN FEB AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON EQUITY INDEX DERIVATIVES REACHED 269,082 CONTRACTS, UP +15.5% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017
* IN FEB AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON SPOT FOREIGN EXCHANGE MARKET OF FASTMATCH, STOOD AT $21,113 MILLION, UP +27.3% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017
* IN FEB AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON INDIVIDUAL EQUITY DERIVATIVES REACHED 315,270 CONTRACTS, UP +11.7% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017
* IN FEB AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME ON COMMODITIES DERIVATIVES REACHED 54,528 CONTRACTS, DOWN -5.9% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017
* IN FEB AVERAGE DAILY TRANSACTION VALUE ON ETFS ORDER BOOK WAS EUR 419 MILLION, UP +66.7% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
